My Projects

A few of the projects I've worked on(both personal and professional)

Dream of Me is a first-person escape room adventure game with a deep and surreal storyline made in Unity

It's still in development.

Project Page(Demo) Gameplay Video

Traveling Merchant is an upcoming game under development.Coming for mobile platforms!

More details soon!

COMING SOON! COMING SOON!

Goaltender VR is a sports-training virtual reality game available on Steam

I helped with creating most of the sports gear and some machinery.

Project Page Images

Thunderent's Assets is my publisher's name on the Unity Asset Store

I sell various 3D props and environments, mostly for video-games.

Store Page Freebie!

PassCrypt is an application made in Java for encrypting and storing passwords safely. I built the application a while ago and still use it to this day.

Download (SOON) Project

WPAIO What Page Am I On ( java application for keeping track of a reading list).Book lists can be saved/loaded from an external .xml file.

Download (SOON) Project

Haufe Meeting App a mobile application which displays meeting room information. Developed as part of Haufe Summer Practice program for students.
